signIn.title: Sign in to your account
signIn.description: Welcome back! Please sign in to continue.

legal.bySigningIn: By signing in, you agree to our

legal.bySigningUp: By signing up, you agree to our

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link.

success.title: Check your email
success.description: We've sent you a password reset link.

resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.description: Use the form below to change your password. This request will expire in

success.title: Password reset
success.description: Your password has been successfully reset.

expired.title: Link expired
expired.description: This password reset link has expired.

verifyEmail.title: Please check your email
verifyEmail.description: Your registration has been successful. We have sent you an email with a verification link.
verifyEmail.alternativeText: Alternatively you can use the one-time password in the email for verification.
verifyEmail.ifEmailExists: If the email exists and is unverified, a verification email has been sent
verifyEmail.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

success.title: Email verified
success.description: Your email has been successfully verified. You can log in with your account now.

expired.title: Email verification is expired
expired.description: Sorry, your email verification is already expired! You need to request a verification again.

expired.title: Link expired
expired.description: This email change link has expired.

invalid.title: Invalid link
invalid.description: This email change link is invalid.

totp.title: Authenticator code
totp.description: Please enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app.

recoveryCode.title: Recovery code
recoveryCode.description: Each recovery code can be used exactly once to grant access without your authenticator.
